profile.profileName: [La Mama, New York, NY, USA] Performance organization

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative description. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Rights & restrictions
label.description: Narrative description of rights held and/or restrictions under which the item is bound.

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Running time
label.description: The running time of the production. Enter durations in any of the following formats: hh:mm:ss (hours/minutes/seconds), Xh Xm Xs (hours/minutes/seconds) or XXXs (seconds).

label.name: Institution
label.description: Name of the institution to which the collection belongs.
